name: Geometry Chaos
description:
Unleash inner hell of this chaotic bullet-hell shooter!

Geometry Chaos is a 2D top down shooter that makes your blood boil.

Try to top the leaderboard and be the best Geometry slayer ever!

Note: If this is your first time playing, you might want to check out the "How To Play" section first.

Check out the music here:

  1. Chaos Above All
  2. Blasting Lights
